channel.title: [Release] My custom DQ server!
channel.description:
Well since peeter released Dark Quest i wanted to play with it modifying some stuff, and well here it is! It is great for offline play, and maybe online too. :)
Most important changes are:
[ul][li]Does NOT have the status changing panel. Thanks to Cleako for it[/li] [li]Shrink the world map (only Edgeville, Wilderness and the area near wildy border are accessible).[/li] [li]Changed teleport location to more usefull places (the wilderness lever teleport will tele to the hidden room in edge dungeon. [/li] [li]Many shops and npc relocated. [/li] [li]Many npc and monsters sprites and stats has been altered (for good i hope).[/li] [li]Adamant is now golden (ex. Adamantite 2-hander sword is now Golden 2-hander sword :p).[/li] [li]RSCD exp formula for combat skills changed to this [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,487238.0.html]here[/url].[/li] [li]And many more surprises![/li][/ul]
If you are going to host it... tell me, i would love to play! :D
Here are some screenshots:
[IMG]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/7641/dq01.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/2108/dq021.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/2940/dq022.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/3339/dq03.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/5026/dq041.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/74/dq042.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/5421/dq043.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/4713/dq05.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/8304/dq09.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/660/dqtest05.png[/img]
Credits: Reines, peeter, xent, marwolf, yong ming, k09 etc...
Client [url=http://uppit.com/i20qqd5lexxs/DQ.zip]Here[/url] Server [url=http://uppit.com/491xtiqyezsa/Server.zip]Here[/url]
IMPORTANT! there is 2 characters; admin and player, pass for both is admin.
And I added readme files with some basic steps so you can run it offline, you don't even need to compile to run it. If anything goes wrong post here and i will try to help.

@latifundio wrote:

I have added more pictures and remade the list of changes. There is still some thing i need to fix with the landscape editor but is not big deal. :o

IlikeArrays:

Must of been pretty bored. ^Reminds me of something I did once. If your extremely bored add construction. I only got to spawning tables and chairs.

Lol you only got to spawning table and chairs? That would take no time at all you make out as if you did loads and then got bored

and oh god please don’t say darscape is coming back lol

item.title: [Release] My custom DQ server!
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Before that, you probably should look at if you want to spend the hundreds of dollars every month it will cost to pay for Staminus’ DDoS protection. If you don’t, then our Turkish Idiot friend will cast his botnet upon thee.

item.title: [Release] My custom DQ server!
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“id4me22, post:11, topic:416075”]id love to play/ host youre sever![/quote]Well first thing you need to do is run it. Be sure to have Wamp and apache-ant installed. Download both client and server and extract them to your home folder and read the readme files. Hope all goes well and if and if you run into problems just post here and maybe me or someone else will help you.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] My custom DQ server!
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“cleako, post:9, topic:416075”]Latifundio, let me know if you need access to the SVN again. I made a few changes here and there to keep things up to date for when I get back into this once the semester is over. - An old friend.[/quote]Yea i saw the forums are up again! I will try to stay update on the servers status and hopeful playing too. But i won’t be messing up with the server source for a while so thanks anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] My custom DQ server!
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:7, topic:416075”]needs a princes in top of a tower with either a dragon/bowser walking around imo.[/quote]I was thinking to move the vampire to one of the towers with boss like stats and that it shooted iban blast if someone was trying to use ranged, but i have no clue how to do that.

By the way remembers me of a building that i found playing the elders scrolls arena, the thing was you did had to loot the coffins before the counter reaches zero and the vampire would get you… i could not make it out lol!

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] My custom DQ server!

item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Well since peeter released Dark Quest i wanted to play with it modifying some stuff, and well here it is! It is great for offline play, and maybe online too.

Most important changes are:

[ul][li]Does NOT have the status changing panel. Thanks to Cleako for it[/li]
[li]Shrink the world map (only Edgeville, Wilderness and the area near wildy border are accessible).[/li]
[li]Changed teleport location to more usefull places (the wilderness lever teleport will tele to the hidden room in edge dungeon. [/li]
[li]Many shops and npc relocated. [/li]
[li]Many npc and monsters sprites and stats has been altered (for good i hope).[/li]
[li]Adamant is now golden (ex. Adamantite 2-hander sword is now Golden 2-hander sword :p).[/li]
[li]RSCD exp formula for combat skills changed to this here.[/li]
[li]And many more surprises![/li][/ul]

If you are going to host it… tell me, i would love to play!

Here are some screenshots:

Credits: Reines, peeter, xent, marwolf, yong ming, k09 etc…

Server Here

IMPORTANT! there is 2 characters; admin and player, pass for both is admin.

And I added readme files with some basic steps so you can run it offline, you don’t even need to compile to run it. If anything goes wrong post here and i will try to help.
